profile:
Since 2015, Pro Climate Heating & cooling has taken pride in providing the Greater Toronto Area with superior, honest and reliable Heating and Air Conditioning services.
Pro climate is dedicated to its founding principle - building relationships based upon mutual trust and respect.
Our team consists of several licensed and highly trained technicians that have the experience and expertise to successfully complete all types of commercial and industrial projects.
We bring you the quality, dependability, and cost savings you want for your operations and offer you the highest level of knowledge and experience to service and provide solutions to your residential and commercial heating and cooling needs.
We work with the best brands in the industry and offer the best prices & warranties.

Pro Climate provides the following professional services:
- Air conditioner
- Furnace 
- IN-Door air quality
- Water heater
- HVAC System
- Radiant In-floor Heating System
- Hydronic Snow Melt System
- Sheet Metal Ductwork
-Patio heater 
-Fireplace
products:
FURNACE
AIR CONDITIONER
HOT WATER TANK
THANKLESS 
BOILER  
SNOW MELTING 
IN FLOOR HEATING 
AIR QUALITY SOLUTION
specialities:
HYDRONIC IN-FLOOR HEATING

HYDRONIC SNOW MELTING 

CENTRAL AIR CONDITIONER 

DUCT WORKING / SHEET METAL 

CENTRAL HEATING SYSTEM FURNACE 

AIR QUALITY SOLUTION
licenses: AC work is subcontracted to licensed trades when required.
